name: Sweet Grilled Shrimp Skewers
author: CHICKLETS
summary: My boyfriend flipped over these.  They are easy enough that you can add or skimp on ingredients and they are virtually fool proof.  Add sweet or spicy at your leisure.  This is a surefire hit!
ingredients: 4 pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Combine brown sugar, lemon juice, molasses, basil, vegetable oil, mustard, honey, clove, ranch dressing, chili powder, and garlic in a large bowl
Toss in shrimp to coat, cover, and refrigerate for 2 hours
Meanwhile, soak wooden skewers in hot water to prevent burning on the grill
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil grate
Thread shrimp tightly on to skewers
Cook on the top rack of the grill for approximately 4 minutes, or until the shrimp turns pink on one side
Flip shrimp and cook for an additional 2 to 4 minutes, or until there are no signs of grey
Use a fork to remove shrimp from the skewers
